page.title: 15LEISURE SURVEY 2
page.content: 2. FAVOURITE HOBBY When asked to choose a single favourite hobby the responses were: Sporting activities 14; Gardening 10, Horse riding 5; Music 5; Boating, Cooking, Craftwork, Flower arranging, Motorsport, Reading, Walking, Wine making 2 each; Antique collecting, Discussion group, Electronics/ computing, Furniture restoration, Model railways, Vintage car collecting 1 each. 3. FREQUENCY OF LEISURE ACTIVITY. How many times a week engage in favourite hobby. Less than once 4.3%; once 34%; two/three times 36.2%; four/five times 4.3%; six/seven times 21.3%. 4MEMBERSHIP OF CLUB/GROUP 43.9% were members of a club as part of their favourite hobby and 56.1% were not.
